name: Sunkern

evolution.description: Sunkern can evolve into Sunflora at level 7 and above with the help of a Sun Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Seed Pokémon. Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing, subsisting only on morning dew.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: Damage rolls for this Pokémon get an additional +2 during harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on rolls to wake from sleep.
